page.title: 05CLIMATE
page.content: {CLIMATE AND WEATHER. Generally mild and damp with no extremes. {FOOTPATHS. Footpaths in the area are mostly open but not well used. They are checked by the Peak and Northern Footpath Society and recently Mobberley Parish Council have asked the local Preservation Soc. to review them. {POLLUTION. WATER:- Some pollution in the streams and river in this area. The B.V.P. gives them a 'C' rating - high pollution level. However Birkin Brook is relatively clean and contains fish. ATMOSPHERIC:- A certain amount of pollution as indicated by small number of lichens growing in area. NOISE:- The noise of aircraft during take-off from Manchester Airport is literally deafening.
